job_tasks.phrase: Jij spreekt de taal van developers en begrijpt de behoeften van de business.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand business requirements and translate them.

job_tasks.phrase: Dat maakt dat jij als spin in het web partijen goed met elkaar kunt verbinden.
job_tasks.justification: Describes the role of connecting different parties, implying an understanding of business needs and how to bridge them with technical solutions.
The core role of the job is related to developing automated tests, which falls under software development.
Writing scripts is a direct software development activity.
Analyzing complex systems is a prerequisite for developing effective test automation.
Identifying and implementing process improvements often involves developing or modifying software components.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring hebt met API testen in tools zoals Postman, SoapUI of REST-Assured
job_tasks.justification: API testing is a form of software development and integration testing.

job_tasks.phrase: Bekend bent met CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps, GitLab of Jenkins.
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD pipelines are fundamental to operations engineering and deploying software.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij spreekt de taal van developers en begrijpt de behoeften van de business.
Dat maakt dat jij als spin in het web partijen goed met elkaar kunt verbinden.
Jij weet hoe je jouw loopbaan wil vormgeven en gaat daar actief mee aan de slag.
je vindt het leuk om complexe systemen te analyseren
houd je graag bezig met procesverbeteringen.
Zo werk je samen met je team aan het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit.

classification.rationale: This job description heavily focuses on traditional test automation, software development, and CI/CD, with a mention of 'affinity with GenAI' as a desirable trait rather than a core responsibility. There is no evidence of core GenAI engineering tasks such as prompt engineering, RAG, or model fine-tuning.
